meanings.definition: A shrub of the genus Callicarpa, typically bearing bright purple berries.
meanings.sent1: The beautyberry in the garden has vibrant purple berries.
meanings.sent2: I picked some beautyberries to make a colorful bouquet.
meanings.sent3: The beautyberry tried to outshine the roses in the flower bed.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as bright as a beautyberry in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The beautyberry's purple hue stood out among the green leaves.

meanings.definition: The brightly colored berries of the beautyberry shrub.
meanings.sent1: The birds feasted on the beautyberries hanging from the shrub.
meanings.sent2: She made a delicious jam using the ripe beautyberries.
meanings.sent3: The beautyberries looked like tiny jewels on the bush.
meanings.sent4: The beautyberries glistened in the morning dew like precious gems.
meanings.sent5: The children's eyes widened at the sight of the beautyberries' vivid colors.
